code: @Test public void testResolveHeaderAfterTransactedDSL() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:transactedHeader").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:transactedHeader").message(0).header("myHeader").isEqualTo("transacted").     template.requestBody("direct:transactedHeader", "Hello").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Test public void testResolveBodyAfterTransactedDSL() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:transactedBody").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:transactedBody").message(0).body().isEqualTo("transacted").     template.requestBody("direct:transactedBody", "Hello").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
